column1: A little pine tree was in the woods.It had no leaves. It had needles.The little tree said
column2: "I do not like needles. All the other trees in the woods have pretty leaves. I want leaves
column3: too. But I will have better leaves. I want gold leaves."Night came and the little tree went to sleep. A fairy came by and gave it gold leaves.When the little tree woke it had leaves of gold.It said
column5: I am so pretty! No other tree has gold leaves."Night came.A man came by with a bag. He saw the gold leaves. He took them all and put them into his bag.The poor little tree cried
column6: "I do not want gold leaves again. I will have glass leaves."So the little tree went to sleep. The fairy came by and put the glass leaves on it.The little tree woke and saw its glass leaves.How pretty they looked in the sunshine! 'No other tree was so bright.Then a wind came up. It blew and blew.The glass leaves all fell from the tree and were broken.
